headline: Regions Financial price target lowered to $21 from $24 at Truist
summary: Truist lowered the firm’s price target on Regions Financial (RF) to $21 from $24 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares. The firm lowered its 2026 EPS forecast by 2% to $2.45, citing lower net interest income due to loan growth pressure and lower fees due to capital markets volatility, partially offset by fewer reserve builds and more share buybacks. headline: Angela Santone Joins Regions Bank as Chief People Officer
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., April 22, 2025--An experienced C-suite human resources executive, Angela Santone is joining Regions Bank as Chief People Officer effective May 12.
